title: Kasumin’s Perfect Plan : Day 7
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Kasumi-san, you don’t look so well, what’s wrong?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>….It’s nothing<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Umm…. I’m holding on to…. letters addressed to you…. from everyone else. Read these and cheer up<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Waah, this many!? There are letters from μ’s and Aqours members, there are ones from Karin-san and the others too….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Hiih…. Kasumin doesn’t want to read them~! They’re definitely lectures~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>….Did you do something to deserve to be lectured?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Uu, it’s because…. Kasumin’s fortune said that if Kasumin did it Kasumin’s wish would come true….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>?? Tell us more about it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Umm, Kasumin’s luck was really great up until yesterday. And Kasumin read online that if Kasumin pranks someone successfully while Kasumin’s luck is at it’s best mode, Kasumin’s wish will come true….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>What kind of wish?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>….To be popular with everyone<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Normally…. if you play pranks on people…. they’ll get mad at you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Hmm…. But, Kasumi-san’s pranks are, how do you say it, you know….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>….Yeah, it’s like that<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Right? Hey, Kasumi-san. These letters might not be lectures after all<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>That possibility…. is high. Kasumi-chan…. it’s better to read them<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Uu~.... Kasumin won’t read them okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Just one. Okay? Look, I’m opening it, okay? Umm…. “The lemon cough drops helped my throat feel better, thanks” it said<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>This one says “The already delicious sweets became even more delicious~, way to go, Kasumi-chan”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Eeh!? W-, what about the others…. “Rin would like to drink Kasumi-chan’s original drink again nya!”, “The cold towel felt good”....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>“The mikan jam bread roll was delicious! Make it again sometimes!” ….it said. They didn’t turn up to be lectures huh, Kasumi-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>The rest of the letters…. are also thanking you, Kasumi-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Did Kasumin’s wish come true….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Fufu, it seems so<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ah, that’s not everyone yet! How about you two, Shizuko, Rinako? Do you guys like Kasumin!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Of course, I love you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I love you too, Kasumi-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Ehehehe~. Kasumin also rea~lly loves the two of you, Rinako, Shizuko, and everyone else too!! It seems that Kasumin’s luck is in it’s best mode after all-!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
